page.title: 13OCCUPATIONS I
page.content:
Most people have to go outside the parish of Cummertrees to do work.Most people have a car or motorbike or get a lift.If you can't drive or can't get a lift you can get a bus or taxi.You could cycle to your work if you have a bike.
In the parish you can work at the village's playgroup, which quite a few children go to. When you work at the playgroup maybe twice a year you have to take the children out for a trip.Most people that stay in the parish to work are farmers or farm workers. Farm workers need a driving licence because a lot of farm work is tractor driving.There are lots of old people so there are home helps.
